type.description:
## Hostile

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/hostile).

Checks if the entity is an instance of `HostileEntity`

Type ID: `apugli:hostile`

---

### Example
```json
"condition": {
    "type": "apugli:hostile"
}
```
